caption.p: Effect of Bupleurum rigidum subp. paniculatum essential oil ( a) and fluoconazole ( b) on Candida albicans ATCC 10231 biofilm biomass and viability. One-way ANOVA followed by Dunnettâ€™s multiple comparison test (performed in separate on each feature), * p < 0.05, compared to biofilm mass control; # p < 0.05 and ## p < 0.01, compared to biofilm viability control; arrows indicate MIC value.
